body:
So this is quite simple. Basically just post anything (pictures, quotes, jokes etc.) you find funny, so that everybody can have a good laugh :P
The point of this is that if your feeling bored or sad, just take a look at some funny things to brighten your mood :)
Here are a few:
Good old txts

title: -=*=- The Avicus Entertainment Page -=*=-

replies.body:
Somtimes, when I close my eyes, I can't see.

It took me 10 years to finally learn how to spell WATER BOTTEL

The brocolli said, "I look like a tree." The mushroom said, "I look like an umbrella." The walnut said, "I look like a brain." The banana said, "Can we skip the topic?"

If Americans throw rice at weddings, do Chinese throw hamburgers?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
"And no, if you guys don't know, he is not the best at MC. He is nowhere NEAR at Pvp. Want Pvp, Select Huahwi, or Grapeapplesauce. He is a good entertainer though, for people under 10."

~KrazyKrafter
